definitions: divide (an image) into pixels, typically for display or storage in a digital format.

(of an image on a computer screen or other display) be enlarged so far that the viewer sees the individual pixels that form the image, the enlargement having reached the point at which no further detail can be resolved.
shortDefinitions: be enlarged so far that viewer sees individual pixels that form image, enlargement having reached point

definitions: display an image of (someone or something) on television as a small number of large pixels, typically in order to disguise someone's identity.
shortDefinitions: display image of person or thing on television as small number of large pixels
